subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Maybe this is clearer?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Hi Dave;

I'm using chips designed to be used with those small plastic transistor 
radio type tuning capacitors, and it I just modify the tank circuit to use 
varactors, I don't see why it wouldn't work with store bought radio, I'll 
give it a try.



Frank
